channel.title: The Debian system +/- systemd
channel.description:
Just as the world of basic particle physics is divided into matter and anti-matter, the world population is divided into two camps. Those who like or don't care about systemd and those who fucking loathe it so much that they actively seek out Lennart to assassinate him. That's what the man gets for writing mankind's greatest gift.
The great thing about Debian is choice. So irrelevant of what faction you belong to in this great struggle, on Debian you can do whatever you like! Check it out here:
https://grep.be/blog//en/computer/cluebat/Systemd__Devuan__and_Debian/
